title: 10 Year Anniversary Gift
body: So what exactly did we get if we had Kayle and her skin already? I just logged in and received the prompt for the mystery gift [and pressed ok], but I have no idea what I got or where it is. I don't think there's anything new in my loot page and I checked my purchase history and all I got was the icon. Does everyone get the icon or is that what I got for having the champ and skin? Sigh

replies.body:
Yeah I was thinking the same thing lol. I went to the account settings < Purchase History
and it only showed the Icon. I'll just wait a while and see what happens lol.

I got riot kayle through hextech crafting a while ago and am experiencing the same problem, I received the icon but didn't get a mystery gift. I don't know if this helps but this is all that I could think might affect the situation.
I'm with ya buddy, received icon but no mystery gift. Riot says they are coming so I guess we just wait! :D

Just had the same problem.  A chest briefly showed up on my screen but wasn't openable.  When I went to purchase history/gift history, only the summoner icon shows up.

Definitely bugged.

The gifts are still being prepped for a roll out, so it's going to be a few moments before every account sees it.  According to the [announcement](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/riot-games/announcements/thank-you), players who already have the champion and skin will receive a mystery gift instead.  Looking into your specific case, you received the notification banner for the Anniversary Icon.  Hang tight as gifts continue to come!
